name: NOOKA x GOMMI ARCADE® ‘FUTURE-SHOCK’ Watch
description: PRODUCT DETAILS GOMMI Zub Zot 20 Nooka has come together with New York based, Tokyo-inspired multi-media entertainment company, GOMMI ARCADE®, to create the limited edition ‘Future-Shock’ zub timepiece. The limited edition piece is a twist on the time manipulation device worn by Gommi in the ‘Future-Shock’ comic/manga. It features the popular Nooka zub zot face in blue, with the original GOMMI 'Animated’ iconic artwork printed on a white polyurethane band. PRODUCT DETAILS *Very Limited Quantities/Special Edition *Size: 38×38x10mm case with 20mm Printed White Polyurethane Band *Water Resistant to 3ATM *Functions: Alarm, Chronograph, Date, Time *Battery: CR2016 Battery (3.0VDC Operating Voltage) *Module: 32,768Hertz Quartz Crystal Oscillation Frequency *Display: TDF LCD Display Electroluminescent(EL) *Case Material: Co-molded With PU Body *Case Back: Stainless Steel/Screw In *Style#: GA-485GG03 ART INSPIRED BY THE STORY OF GOMMI ARCADE® “…Katsu sees Gommi on his screen as the evil officers are escorting him to a patrol car. A reporter interrupts the officers trying to ask Gommi a series of questions to which he only replies “Future-Shock”, a secret call to action for the ARMi and a codename for his time manipulation watch made at the Top Secret Nooka laboratory, the watch is a powerful tool as the device uses a “forward” and “rewind” function that can send the handcuffs holding Gommi forward in time, causing them to rust in real time, or send a hand held weapon without ammunition backwards in time until it returns to a reloaded usable state. However, these major alterations in time are highly unstable and will begin to revert almost immediately.” TO BE CONTINUED…

name: GOMMI ARCADE® x SABIT "Homecoming/S.T.A.R. ACADEMY II" VARSITY JACKET (Gray/Black)
description: SPECIAL EDITION Once again...East meets West wtih these two Japanese inspired New York City based lifestyle brands, GOMMI ARCADE® and Sabit NYC! The GOMMI ARCADE® x Sabit NYC "Homecoming/S.T.A.R. ACADEMY II" VARSITY JACKET is inspired by the Homecoming tradition of welcoming back former residents and alumni of an educational institution. It most commonly refers to a tradition in many universities, colleges and high schools in North America. It usually includes activities for students and alumni, such as sports and culture events and a parade through the streets of the city or town. PLEASE NOTE: Item available for Pre-Sale Only. Will be shipped starting October 17, 2011. Limited to only 400 jackets worldwide. *Please limit 1 per customer. PRODUCT DETAILS *Limited Edition/400 pcs. *Features Logos from both Brands *Double Entry: Zipper and Snap Buttons *Chain Stitch Direct Embroidery *7 Knit Chenille Patches *2 Front Pockets, 1 Interior Pocket *Leather Pocket Trimming *Materials: All Fleece Body and Sleeves *Breathable, Flexible, Satin Nylon Lining *Available Colors: Heather Gray Body with Black Sleeves *Size Specs below: CHEST: S-44", M-46.5", L-49", XL-51.5", XXL-54", XXXL-56.5, XXXXL-59" SLEEVE: S-32-33", M-33-34", L-34-35", XL-35-36", XXL-35-36", XXXL-37-38", XXXXL-38-39" CUFF: S-6", M-6.5", L-7", XL-7.5", XXL-8", XXXL-8.5", XXXXL-9" ART INSPIRED BY THE STORY OF GOMMI ARCADE® "The Science, Technology, Academia & Research (S.T.A.R.) Academy is a private research university located in what appears to be the city-nation of Neo Tokio. The S.T.A.R. Academy has five schools and one college, containing a total of 36 academic departments, with a strong emphasis on scientific and technological research. Gommi Arcadian attends the S.T.A.R. Academy with his friends the ARMi (Art, Research & Media Intelligence), a ghost name for this band of cyberpunks who form the resistance movement of Neo Tokio. The group is made up of a total of five S.T.A.R. Academy school students who are all intelligent and artistic, yet outspoken outcasts.” TO BE CONTINUED... The saga begins at gommiarcade.com *SAVE JAPAN*

name: GOMMI ARCADE® – Episode I: Welcome to Neo Tokio (Manga/Comic/Novel)
description: COLLECTOR'S EDITION Welcome to the Future (未来へようこそ) – GOMMI ARCADE® presents a sneak peek into the brave new world of Neo Tokio in the year 2145. Title: GOMMI ARCADE® – Episode I: Welcome to Neo Tokio Genre(s): Science Fiction, Cyberpunk, Young Adult, Manga (Japanese comics) Synopsis: The saga begins in the year 2145 A.D. in Neo Tokio, a city-nation split between both the “real world” and the extensively detailed digitized world. Considered by its citizens the most technologically advanced society, it is really a simulated reality, a socially isolated virtual world where all individuals are under intense supervision to ensure compliance with the new order. Controlled by Supreme Executives – a top ranking mercenary agency in charge of managing the city of Neo Tokio and policing its citizens – for the sole purpose of pacifying and subduing all forms of youth culture: restricting self-expression, curbing intellectual curiosity and perpetually enslaving its citizens. However, the years of regimentation and draconian censorship gave birth to a counter-culture that embraced art, design and expression. A teenager named Gommi Arcadian plans a rebellion against the owners of Neo Tokio and forms a resistance movement known as ARMi (Art, Research, Media and Intelligence), which strikes back at the empire utilizing innovative technology, graphic design and street art to spread messages of inspiration and creative freedom. To Be Continued… Copyright © 2013, GOMMI ARCADE, Inc. All of the text, words, art, pictures, logos, characters, story, concept and images herein, unless otherwise noted, are copyrighted by GOMMI ARCADE, Inc.
